name: Dreaming Chicken
description:
You are a chicken in an ordinary rural village.
You have no complaints about your life in the countryside, but one day you see some birds flying around and you have a dream.
"I have wings, I can do this."



As you begin your journey to the heights of the world, it won't always be peaceful.
But you'll get closer to your dreams as you push through your fears and climb step by step.

Don't be afraid to make mistakes.
You can learn from them, too.

What's up there?
Only those who have been to the heights will know.

"Dreaming Chicken" is a platformer game where you follow a mysterious path and aim for the top.
As a feature of the game, you will utilize a two-stage jump to reach the heights.
The game doesn't have the ability to save your progress, and the higher you climb, the greater your fear of making mistakes will be.
The game cheers you on as you overcome this and climb.

I would estimate the average play time to be between 20 and 60 minutes.
This game requires patience, so I would advise you to think twice before purchasing the game.
